BackstoryDef.title: sheltered child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the first of [PAWN_possessive] gender to be born to [PAWN_possessive] tribe in years. [PAWN_possessive] elders treat [PAWN_objective] like a precious treasure, seldom allowing [PAWN_objective] to wander even an inch out of sight. This obsessive safeguarding lead to [PAWN_nameDef] gaining limited knowledge about the outside world.

BackstoryDef.title: bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed in town squares for tips, usually reciting traditional poetry or tales of local legends and folklore. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew, so did [PAWN_possessive] talent in playing various instruments. By adolescence, [PAWN_nameDef] had a proficiency in over five instruments.

BackstoryDef.title: captured
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s community was shackled and enslaved to a Sanguaphage kingdom, with [PAWN_nameDef] assigned to endless nights of manual labour. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_possessive] escape by squeezing [PAWN_objective]self in a transport pod full of cargo and launching to freedom.

BackstoryDef.title: scamp
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age, and became the responsibility of [PAWN_possessive] entire community. Elders doted on this adorable little scamp, and taught [PAWN_objective] a myriad of skills.

BackstoryDef.title: chattel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was bought by an aristocratic couple, who exhibited [PAWN_objective] like an exotic good at social soirees. High-status attendees would poke and prod at this exotic xenotype, having never seen one so small and ugly in the flesh before. When an open window presented itself as an opportunity to [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] fled, never to return to the husk of a life [PAWN_pronoun] once lived.

BackstoryDef.title: butler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] catered for the highest members of society. Social gatherings at [PAWN_possessive] master's castle were [PAWN_nameDef]’s favourite, though, as many royal guests saw novelty in such a strangely beautiful xenotype, and oftentimes invited [PAWN_objective] to their lodgings once the sun had set.

BackstoryDef.title: composer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] always dreamed of [PAWN_possessive] name in lights one day as a musical icon. [PAWN_nameDef] mixed traditional instruments with modern-day techniques to create rehashed explorations of forgotten musical genres. \n\nThough [PAWN_possessive] tracks gained little widespread attention, a small yet passionate following of listeners heralded [PAWN_nameDef] as a musical groundbreaker.

BackstoryDef.title: travelling bard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] journeyed across perilous deserts on a mission to bring music and joy to each and every hamlet [PAWN_pronoun] passed by. Children and elders alike adored the music that [PAWN_nameDef] performed, and taught [PAWN_objective] how to play a plethora of native instruments, only seen before by [PAWN_nameDef] in storybooks.

BackstoryDef.title: gemcutter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] curated a shimmering collection of wondrous gemstones. Mixed into this display were also an assortment of common, shabby stones; but with [PAWN_possessive] silver-tongue, [PAWN_nameDef] could convince anyone with more money than sense that these chunks of dirt were priceless.

BackstoryDef.title: jester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] resided in the stables of a royal lord’s castle. Thinking that [PAWN_pronoun] was worth no more than livestock, [PAWN_possessive] lord had little to do with [PAWN_objective], and only called on for [PAWN_objective] for entertainment and cheap laughs. \n\nThe joke was on the royal lord, however, because [PAWN_nameDef] adored this simple life, and found fulfilment in caring for the animals in the stables like they were family.

BackstoryDef.title: statue
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A fateful encounter with what [PAWN_nameDef] described as a snake-like, humanoid creature left [PAWN_nameDef] encased in stone for an unknown number of years. Having lost almost all memories of [PAWN_possessive] life before this encounter, [PAWN_nameDef] has been tasked to uncover [PAWN_possessive] identity once again.

BackstoryDef.title: dubious apothecarist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Accidentally fermenting a rare genus of jungle plant brought [PAWN_nameDef] to a high of unpredictable proportions, so [PAWN_pronoun] began to harvest and process this potent drug and sell it to travelling merchants. \n\nWeeks passed, and merchants returned to [PAWN_nameDef], battered and bruised, begging [PAWN_objective] for more, lest their customers get angrier and more desperate. In time, [PAWN_nameDef] made a fortune from [PAWN_possessive] underground dealership, before fleeing for concerns of [PAWN_possessive] safety.

BackstoryDef.title: rhapsode
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed dramatic poetry during festivals and celebrations; usually reciting tales of mythical heroes, monsters and battles to the death. Every character that [PAWN_pronoun] played, [PAWN_pronoun] played with gusto and passion, every tale and every twist left listeners with their hair standing on end. [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_possessive] calling in life, and is very reluctant to do anything else.

BackstoryDef.title: feral
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured and reared by a tribe like a wild animal.
